Lyrics: [Written by: Kevin Spencer and Leon Sylvers III]

Lyrics: All your friends are tellin' you
You should have a fancy car and diamond rings
But girl, you know all good things come in time
Girl, you know I'll do just about anything (Anything)
To see a smile (See a smile) upon your face (On your face)
So don't let your friends go messin' with your mind (No, no)
There ain't nothin' I won't do for you
Don't ever doubt my love 'cause it's true
[Chorus: Gerald Levert & Eddie Levert, Eddie Levert]
A man that is hard to find
A man that is hard to find
Oh, girl, wasn't I there when he made you cry?
And who was there to comfort you
When he said, "Bye, bye, bye, bye, bye," baby?
Girl, I give you my time, here is my money
(All of my time, all of my money, all of my heart)
And you'll be so sorry, baby
If we were to ever part, part
That I would never hurt you
That I won't ever desert you
[Chorus: Gerald Levert & Eddie Levert, Eddie Levert]
A man that is hard to find
(Baby baby, baby, you better, you better)
Baby, hold on to me (See I'm)
A man that is hard to find
Baby, see I wanna be everything that you need
And I promise, baby, I promise, baby
I'll be there for you, oh
[Chorus: Gerald Levert & Eddie Levert, Eddie Levert]
A man that is hard to find
[Outro: Gerald Levert & Eddie Levert, Eddie, Gerald]
When you need someone to hold you tight
(See, I like it, I like it)
A man that is hard to find
Hold on, think about it before you let me walk out the door, baby
How can you live without me, baby?
'Cause I can't see myself livin' without you
A man that is hard to find
(Oh, I'm giving it to you, baby)
(So you better keep me around, keep me around)
I know I'm a good man
And your friends keep tellin' you
All about what they don't know
(Listen to what I'm saying when I tell you)
A man that is hard to find
Hold on, I'm tired, I'm tired, I'm tired, I'm tired
Lyric.Title: Gerald Levert – Baby Hold On to Me Lyrics | Genius Lyrics

Lyrics: Never seen a sun shine like this

Never had a flame to ignite

I'm callin out to your body
(I'm calling out) Baby you know just what to do

Lyrics: An endless love, I've found in You

Two joined together, to give from within

Our love shines brighter, than the morning sun
Two hearts together becoming as one
You're a part of me - that never dies
Love undivided, cause we see eye to eye
You and I will become as one
Your love takes me higher, (higher), higher, (higher)
